sentences.en: ‘But why?’ said Charles, being deliberately obtuse.
sentences.cn: “但是为什么呢？”查尔斯故意傻傻地说道。

sentences.en: At time he was almost seductively charming; at other times he was boorish and obtuse.
sentences.cn: 他有时几乎表现得妩媚动人, 有时却土里土气象个十足的笨伯.

sentences.en: European dock with broad obtuse leaves and bitter rootstock common as a weed in North America.
sentences.cn: 有宽钝叶和苦根状茎的欧洲酸模,在北美常作为野草.

sentences.en: For all your energy and brains, you are gloriously obtuse about new realities.
sentences.cn: 尽管你有精力和头脑, 但你对新现实的反应迟钝的可怕.

sentences.en: Graders will be instructed to take off points for convoluted and obtuse descriptions.
sentences.cn: 评分者会被指示对晦涩愚钝的描述扣分.

sentences.en: He was either normally stupid or being deliberately obtuse.
sentences.cn: 他要么是真傻,要么是故意装傻.

sentences.en: I'm a limited and obtuse clergyman while you're the expert.
sentences.cn: 你是专家，而我是个能力有限的愚笨牧师。

sentences.en: I've really been very obtuse and stupid.
She cannot possibly be so obtuse.
The obtuse editor did not know he was being nibbled at.
sentences.cn: 这位脑筋迟钝的编辑并不知道人家是在向他试探消息.

sentences.en: The Passion of the Christ powerfully moving and fanatically obtuse in equal doses.
sentences.cn: 耶稣受难记>非常具有感染力,在相同限量下又显得那么迟钝.

sentences.en: Two opposite corners of this rhomb contain three obtuse angles of 101°95'.
sentences.cn: 菱面体的两个对顶包含着三个101°95'的钝角。

sentences.en: Two opposite corners of this rhomb contain three obtuse angles of 101� � 55 '.
sentences.cn: 菱面体的两个对顶包含着三个101°55'的钝角.

sentences.en: Use the vector dot product to find the obtuse angle between two diagonals of a cube.
sentences.cn: 用矢量点积求立方体的两条对角线所夹的钝角.

trans.tran_cn: 迟钝的，（疼痛）不剧烈的，（印象）不鲜明的，钝角的
trans.tran_en: slow to understand things, in a way that is annoying
